aboutUs.title: About Us
aboutUs.text1: Anbani was founded in 2008 with the goal of providing high-quality made-to-order furniture that combines functionality, style, and durability. Over the years, we have established ourselves as a reliable partner for clients from over 15 countries, offering customized solutions for each project.
aboutUs.text2: Our core values include attention to detail, the use of eco-friendly materials, and a commitment to innovation in furniture design and manufacturing. We take pride in offering a wide range of products, including kitchens, wardrobes, walk-in closets, children's furniture, bathroom furniture, and office furniture.
aboutUs.text3: The Anbani team of professionals works closely with clients at every stage of the process - from concept to installation - to ensure complete satisfaction of their needs and expectations. We strive to create furniture that not only enhances spaces but also improves the quality of life for our clients.

services.title: Our Services
services.description: We offer a full range of custom furniture services, including design, manufacturing, and installation. Our professional team is ready to help you create the perfect solution for your home or office. We take care of the entire process - from measurements to finished furniture in your space.

text1.subtitle: We visit the site and:
text1.line1: take precise measurements of the space
text1.line2: consider walls, corners, niches, and utilities
text1.line4: help you choose materials and fittings

text2.subtitle: We manufacture custom-built furniture to your measurements:
text2.line4: cabinets, chests of drawers, shelving units, and other furniture for home and office

text3.subtitle: We deliver the furniture and handle the installation:

services.subtitle4: With or without a design project

text4.subtitle: You get a result that perfectly fits your space. We work:
text4.line1: With a design project - we follow the drawings precisely
text4.line2: Without a project - we help plan the furniture from scratch
